subdisciplines.name: Polymer Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of polymers and their properties, synthesis, and applications

subdisciplines.name: Nanostructured Materials
subdisciplines.description: The study of materials with structural features on the nanoscale, and their properties and applications

subdisciplines.name: Electronic Materials
subdisciplines.description: The study of materials used in electronic devices, and their properties and applications

subdisciplines.name: Biomaterials
subdisciplines.description: The study of materials used in medical implants, drug delivery systems, and other biomedical applications

subdisciplines.name: Inorganic Materials
subdisciplines.description: The study of materials composed of inorganic compounds, and their properties and applications
